testcase.name: Automate End to End Buy Order functionality.
testcase.system-out: Given Open the URL..........................................................passed And Click on sign in link...................................................passed And Login to the website....................................................passed And Move your cursor over Women's link......................................passed When Click on sub menu 'T-shirts'...........................................passed And 'More' button will be displayed, click on 'More' button.................passed And Select quantity,size,colour and add to cart.............................passed And Click 'Proceed to checkout' button......................................passed And Complete the buy order process till payment.............................passed And Make sure that Product is ordered.......................................passed
